Current Status • Experimentally, charm mixing is small ⇒ CP violation in mixing or interference is small .=
• Standard Model predictions for all types of charm CP violation are well below current sensitivities .=
• Some Standard Model extensions predict direct CP violation up to 1% (almost within reach) .=
Direct CP violation • Only type of CP violation possible for charged mesons .=
• Requires two decay terms with different CP violating (weak) and dif- ferent CP conserving (strong) phases .=
• Differing strong phases comes from final state interactions .=
• In Standard Model differing weak phases often come from tree level and penguin diagrams .=
• In fixed-target experiments (E791 & FOCUS), production asymmetries require normalizing by another (copious) mode, assumed to have no CP violation. Procedure also reduces systematic errors..=

CLEO CP violation search in D0→ K−π+π0 .=
• Point particle Lorentz invariant field theories ⇒ CPT invariance .=
• Some Standard Model extensions need not be Lorentz-invariant .=

– Example: strings are not point particles ⇒ can elude requirement – Start with more fundamental theory operating at, e.g., MPlank – At current energies have spontanteous symmetry breaking in which vacuum acquires quantities oriented in 4-D ⇒ violates particle Lorentz invariance (although not observer Lorentz invariance) .=
• One could find evidence for strings by precision tests of CPT and/or Lorentz invariance .=
•⇒ should search for CPT violation and Lorentz violation .=
• Limits have been set using neutral K and B mesons (mixing interferometry) .=
• No limits yet from charm system.=

Summary of CP (& CPT) violation searches .=
• First CPT violation search in charm from FOCUS (preliminary) .=
Future of CP violation searches in charm .=
– FOCUS is working on Dalitz analyses of 3-body D+ decays such as D+→K−K+π+ and D+→π−π+π+ .=
– CLEO is working on Dalitz analyses of 3-body D0 decays such as D0→K0 +Sπ π .=
– Belle and BaBar will improve on current limits? .=
– CLEO-c will be collecting ∼30 million DD events at the ψ(3770) .=
– Belle and BaBar will continue to provide excellent results .=
– BTeV at the Fermilab Tevatron (pp) will likely be the first experiment to reconstruct 1 billion charm decays.=
